title: How to get a religious exemption for employer or college — THE HEALTHY AMERICAN.org
cleaned_text:
In our Classic CONCIERGE Program, you get an in-depth education about your rights and the laws that protect your religious beliefs so you know how to prepare for your religious exemption and the laws that protect you at the workplace. You access to all of the documents, resources, sample letters, research and resources to help you prepare for your religious exemption. This program gives you the ability to mail Pastor David to get your forms to be signed. You also get to join the several live private group CONCIERGE CALLS for this month. And you get the replays if you can’t make it live. Click here to join the Classic CONCIERGE Program Today!

“CONCIERGE PLUS” is an expanded, updated and revised program designed to empower and equip you to defend your religious rights! Join seven live video calls with Peggy and Pastor David while you connect with other Healthy Americans all across the country. You also get access to all past recordings of every single concierge call, starting back in August 2021, with over 100 hours of Peggy’s detailed, clear teaching. You get an entire EDUCATION about your religious rights, the laws that protect them, and how to defend your rights. This program gives you the ability to mail Pastor David to get your forms to be signed. CLICK HERE TO JOIN OUR “CONCIERGE PLUS” PROGRAM TODAY!

This is how to get personal access to Peggy and Pastor David for individual counseling, along with all of the live private group calls that educate you on your legal rights that protect your religious beliefs so you know how to prepare for your religious exemption and the laws that protect you at the workplace.
• None Peggy and Pastor David will review your forms and letters
• None You get a private one-to-one phone consult with Peggy and Pastor David
• None In addition to the seven live classes, you get an additional VIP MEMBERS-only Q&A live consulting class
• None You get everything in the Concierge Plus Program as well You get immediate access to ALL of CONCIERGE RESOURCES and ALL of the previous months call recordings. That means you are getting approximately 100 hours of in-depth teaching from Peggy and Pastor David. This program gives you the ability to mail Pastor David to get your forms to be signed. CLICK HERE TO ENROLL IN THE VIP PACKAGE TODAY

“Re-watching the videos is incredibly educational and empowering.” Thank you!~ Kim N “I used this process and my accommodation was approved today. Thank you so much Peggy and Pastor Dave! “~ jpmom “I am learning so much....you are an answer to prayer! I was asking God for wisdom on how to handle this at work....and HE led me to your site! Praise God!! “ ~ Rose “This is valuable information. I'm getting education that I need and love that your are forcing me to fight for my rights. Without you I think I would have given in.” ~ Briceida “ I’m an RN and my Religious Exemption (Vaccine only) was accepted, and for that I thank Peggy, Pastor Dave and all of the documents, Zooms and videos!” —Catherine Salsera “This is the best education I have learned on religious rights” ~ Frank Stiba “Best money I ever spent. I have already recommended that people go to your website and check it out.” ~ Marcel

I would like to give a special “Thank you” to Peggy Hall and the rest of the staff at ‘The Healthy American’!



Today I just received my religious exemption status from my employer (hint- a corporate medical company/ facility) and it was approved! Using your religious exemption tools/ letter have not only stated the truth and facts, it also gave them NO reasoning, questioning or any ‘push-back’ from me to ask for any more explanation as to why I refuse to receive the vaccine and why my religion stands firm in my beliefs against it.



This truly was a gift from God! Because of you, I still have my job and am able to provide for my family. Thank you thank you thank you!!!

-From a proud (and grateful) Healthy American K. O.

As of 8/27/2021 my religious exemption was approved with no questions. I am grateful that God guided me to such responsible Americans, as so many of us allow fear to defeat us when such threats attempt to question our faith in God and beliefs. I want to sincerely thank you for the knowledge, support, and resources that ensured my success with protecting my sincerely held religious beliefs. I work for Kaiser Permanente in the administrative health care field. I submitted the exemption letter after watching every video you posted, document resource, and CA laws on The Healthy American .org to ensure that I fully understood how to follow through in the event there was any denial but more so to PREVENT a denial. There was no denial of my exemption to decline the vaccine and invasive testing — I received straight approval! 



Sincerely,

Evelyn C.

THANK YOU !!!!

God bless you and your entire family !!!! I pray that you continue to help the countless of lives live free from the pressures of this systematic world and that you continue to teach people about the word of God and how we can apply it to our everyday lives in the name of Jesus AMEN !



I bought your Concierge Package last night 9/22/21 at 11:37pm and sent the documents to my institution on 9/23/21 at 8am and got approved at 4:03pm. This was a same day approval without any questions. I will recommend your services to each and every one of my family, friends, and even strangers who are currently on the verge of being expelled from schools and or terminated from their workplace.



Thank you for all that you do and I will keep these documents for future incidents in where I might need them. God bless you again Pastor David and Mrs. Peggy.



Sincerely with love and deep gratitude,

Angelica Cabrera
